name: micro-app-monorepo
description: 微前端项目 - 包含主应用和两个子应用

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:main" "npm run dev:child-one" "npm run dev:child-two"
scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:child-one && npm run build:child-two
scripts.preview: concurrently "npm run preview:main" "npm run preview:child-one" "npm run preview:child-two"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:main && npm run install:child-one && npm run install:child-two
scripts.clean: npm run clean:main && npm run clean:child-one && npm run clean:child-two
scripts.clean:main: cd main-app && rmdir /s /q node_modules dist 2>nul || echo "Already clean"
scripts.clean:child-one: cd child-one && rmdir /s /q node_modules dist 2>nul || echo "Already clean"
scripts.clean:child-two: cd child-two && rmdir /s /q node_modules dist 2>nul || echo "Already clean"
scripts.format: npm run format:main && npm run format:child-one && npm run format:child-two
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:main && npm run type-check:child-one && npm run type-check:child-two

author: Wang Junjie
